wordpressWpDailyReads.title: July 10, The Fiduciary Rule
wordpressWpDailyReads.content:
The Department of Labor has officially killed The Fiduciary Rule. This means the Department of Labor has thrown out what was instituted under Obama. What does this mean for you?

Click on the video below to learn more.

yoast_meta.content: July 10, The Fiduciary Rule - Sherman Wealth Management | Financial Planning in MD and DC Metro
